page.title: 14Housing in Hannington
page.content:
There are three main categories of housing:-
(A) Privately Owned - 66%.
(B) Council Owned - 23% - including bungalows built specifically for the elderly.
(C) Tied to Agriculture. - 11%.
There have been few new houses built recently, as planning permission is difficult to obtain. Many of the Council houses have been bought & now privately owned, causing problems for younger people who want to stay in the village, as private housing is very expensive - both in the village and surrounding area.Accordingly, deposits and mortgages for such people are very hard to get.
